description: "This map of the Sunda Isles (‘Isles de la Sonde’) (with red borders) and Maluku Islands (‘Isles Moluques’) (blue borders) also includes mainland Southeast Asia (green borders), the Philippines (yellow borders) and New Guinea (green borders)."
title: "Les isles de la Sonde Moluques Philippines, Carolines, et Mariannes / par le S. Robert de Vaugondy &c. ; grave̓ par E. Dussy."
